jobDescription: We are looking Technical Project Manager who will play a key role in successful customer deployment of PLM solution. You will lead an implementation team in the initiation, planning, design and execution of PLM solution that meet customer requirements.Responsibilities:Lead an implementation team in all aspects of solution deploymentLead the analysis and documentation of customer requirements through the delivery of workshopsDevelop business, functional and non-functional requirements specifications and Use Cases.Transform customer requirements to technical solutionsSkills:Professionally interact and communicate with customers and internal team membersClearly demonstrate the ability to work independently with minimal supervisionHave a thorough understanding of enterprise application deployment methodologies preferably with PLM Solutions.Must be able to write clear, understandable Requirements, SOW, Specification documents, and Use Cases.Thorough knowledge in data modeling techniques and Microsoft Office products.Knowledge in Database – Oracle/SQL Server. Ability to write and troubleshoot PL/SQL and T-SQL queries, scripts, triggers, stored procedures and functionsWorking knowledge of web programming techniques C#, asp .net, Java ScriptKnowledge in ERP systems like SAP, Oracle is a plus..Familiar with data migration techniques from legacy systemsExperience/Education:Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or Engineering Minimum 3 years of PLM deployment experienceMust be able to travel.Why should you work with us?Competitive compensation Health and vision insurance Life insurance coverageTransit commuter and parking benefits PTO, sick time and 12 holidaysEnormous potential for success and growthModern office space in midtown ManhattanAbility to learn new things and work with new technologyFrequent office lunch outings with office snacks and coffee Flexible work schedule with friendly and laid back team
